biotools.summary: A tool for the computation of the similarity matrix among a set of sequences. The tool uses an alignment-free approach to compute sequence similarity measures based on shared maximal words allowing mismatches.

bioschemas.name: MisMax
bioschemas.summary: A tool for the computation of the similarity matrix among a set of sequences. The tool uses an alignment-free approach to compute sequence similarity measures based on shared maximal words allowing mismatches.
